useCase.name: Initiate Service Registration and Data Upload

preconditions.precondition: ML is initialized and ready to receive data.

successEndConditions.condition: Service registration and data upload completed successfully.

mainSequence.step: Z registers the service and reports the network status and node configuration to ML.
ML identifies and stores the uploaded device information.
ML returns tasks for Z to perform forwarding.
Z performs forwarding tasks as instructed by ML.
